message: I'm offering you a great deal on this product for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get a unique item at a fraction of its true value. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a one-time exception on the price. What do you say?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.
